mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review_board (email, title, content, review_bno, business_no, star_rate , private, store_name, store_address, store_detail_address, store_extra_address) VALUES (#{email}, #{title}, #{content}, seq_review_board.nextval, #{businessNo}, #{starRate} , #{isPrivate}, #{storeName}, #{storeAddress}, #{storeDetailAddress}, #{storeExtraAddress})
mapper.select: SELECT rb.review_bno, rb.business_no, rb.email, rb.title, rb.content, rb.last_updated, rb.star_rate, rb.like_cnt , rb.store_name, rb.store_address, rb.store_detail_address, rb.store_extra_address FROM review_board rb WHERE private = 'F' ORDER BY rb.last_updated DESC ORDER BY rb.like_cnt DESC

SELECT rb.review_bno, rb.business_no, rb.email, rb.title, rb.content, rb.last_updated, rb.star_rate, rb.like_cnt , rb.store_name, rb.store_address, rb.store_detail_address, rb.store_extra_address FROM review_board rb WHERE rb.review_bno = #{reviewBno}

SELECT review_bno, email, title, content, last_updated, star_rate, like_cnt, business_no, store_name, store_address FROM review_board WHERE private = 'F' AND email LIKE '%' || #{search}|| '%' OR title LIKE '%' || #{search}|| '%' OR content LIKE '%' || #{search}|| '%' OR store_name LIKE '%' || #{search}|| '%' OR store_address LIKE '%' || #{search}|| '%' OR BUSINESS_NO = #{search} ORDER BY last_updated DESC ORDER BY like_cnt DESC

SELECT review_bno, email, title, content, last_updated, star_rate, like_cnt, business_no, store_name, store_address FROM review_board WHERE private = 'F' AND ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5 AND BUSINESS_NO = #{search} ORDER BY last_updated DESC ORDER BY like_cnt DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM review_like WHERE review_bno=#{reviewBno} AND email=#{email}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review_like WHERE email=#{email} AND review_bno=#{reviewBno}
SELECT review_bno FROM review_like WHERE email=#{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review_upload (review_bno, file_path, file_name, file_size, file_type, file_byte, file_data) values (#{reviewBno}, #{filePath}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileType}, #{fileByte}, #{fileData})
mapper.select: select file_data from review_upload where review_bno = #{reviewBno} order by review_bno
select review_bno from review_board where email = #{email}
